Description:
V. MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS AND QUALIFICATIONS Bachelor degree in Engineering (typically Chemical, Mechanical or Electrical) preferably with Commercial background.
Commercial experience in 5 to 8 years with Industrial Gas background.
Proven experience in sales and/or marketing and managing relationships with key accounts.
In-depth understanding of market research methods and analysis.
Solid knowledge of performance reporting and financial/budgeting processes.
Commercial awareness partnered with a strategic mindset.
Excellent organizational and leadership skills.
Outstanding communication and interpersonal abilities.
A track record in which strong technical and practical operational skills have been demonstrated.
Demonstrates abilities in the areas of asset enhancement and financial results.
Capable of functioning in goal-driven, fast-paced environments.
Must be self-regulated and to possess the ability to work independently.
A track record of success on Safety, Environmental, Quality and Employee Involvement
Saudi National ideal, but not must for this position.Job Details
